release_notes.en-US:
- Italian translation corrections
 - New warning panel to install SimpleStatistics
release_notes.it:
- Correzioni nella traduzione in italiano
 - Nuovo pannello di avviso per installare SimpleStatistics

description.en-US: Thunderretract is a Mozilla Thunderbird add-on implementing client-side retract. Server-side retract is implemented by many enterprise product, but popular email protocols do not provide users with the possibility of retracting or correcting messages already sent and delivered. Thunderretract allows requesting the retraction of a message: if the recepient has not already read the message and if she installed the add-on, the message will be (optionally) deleted from her inbox. If the recepient does not allow deletion, he will be notified an apology (customizable on sender-side). Thunderretract also allow correcting delivered messages: if a message already sent contains mistakes or erroneous information, the sender can re-open it (from her 'set items'), make some changes, and re-send it. The recipient (if she installed the add-on) will see the changes highlighted on a new message, will be able to compare the two messages, and will be able to quickly re-open the previous version (otherwise she will see both messages). The add-on has been developed as a master thesis, it is freeware, but we would like to involve you in our survey on the usage of email: please download and install also SimpleStatistics (https://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=246943&package_id=303677) [it is a separate and independent add-on!], and periodically send us a report on the number of email you send and receive. It will hel research at the University of Milano-Bicocca. If you have any question on this point, please contact us (simplestatistics@gmail.com).

Server-side retract is implemented by many enterprise product, but popular email protocols do not provide users with the possibility of retracting or correcting messages already sent and delivered. Thunderretract allows requesting the retraction of a message: if the recepient has not already read the message and if she installed the add-on, the message will be (optionally) deleted from her inbox. If the recepient does not allow deletion, he will be notified an apology (customizable on sender-side). Thunderretract also allow correcting delivered messages: if a message already sent contains mistakes or erroneous information, the sender can re-open it (from her 'set items'), make some changes, and re-send it. The recipient (if she installed the add-on) will see the changes highlighted on a new message, will be able to compare the two messages, and will be able to quickly re-open the previous version (otherwise she will see both messages). The add-on has been developed as a master thesis, it is freeware, but we would like to involve you in our survey on the usage of email: please download and install also SimpleStatistics (https://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=246943&package_id=303677) [it is a separate and independent add-on!], and periodically send us a report on the number of email you send and receive. caption.it: Un esempio di avviso di messaggio ritirato/corretto.

summary.en-US: ThunderRetract implements client-side eMail retraction into Thunderbird. This is done showing messages differences in original and retracted one.
summary.it: ThunderRetract implementa un meccanismo client-side per l'eMail retraction in Thunderbird. Mostra le differenze tra il messaggio originale e quello ritratto.
